text: Headlines: The UK has just approved a #Covid19 #vaccine - the first Western nation to formally do so. The vaccine, produced by #Pfizer and #BioNTech, will need to be stored at ultra-cold temperatures. @KPFA & Free Speech TV (3 pm PT), @KPFK (4 pm PT), https://t.co/36KL8tuYa9 https://t.co/WE97BBw9pV
